actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to publish information on the degree of effluent reduction attainable through the application of chemical processes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to deem chemical treatment processes based on chemical additives such as ferric chloride and anionic polymers to be secondary treatment for purposes of information to be published by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency on effluent reduction attainable through secondary treatment.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to publish information on the degree of effluent reduction attainable through the application of chemical processes.
